ComicInfo.Summary:
The Tale of Fred the Horse! This issue takes place between episodes 4-5 of the Cartoon Network miniseries and tells the story of Fred, a down-on-his-luck horse who finds himself in trouble with the Highwayman.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jim Campbell | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Bob Flynn | 2 | Var | 1:20 Variant Cover | Chelsea O’Byrne | 3 | RE | BOOM! Studios Exclusive Variant Cover | Jordan Crane | Missing |
